    AI Dev Agents — Windy platform

    Internal beta · Orchestrator MVP shipped

    AI-native developer workstation orchestrating autonomous coding agents, multi-tier storage, and progress-aware execution.
  • 05

    DevTalk — Autonomous incident response workbench

    Internal beta · Slack-first

    AI-augmented console that turns natural-language work requests into diagnostics, code fixes, and runbooks without leaving chat.
  • 06

    FlexEx — AI workout companion

    Pre-launch · App Store queued

    Gen Z-focused fitness app pairing instant AI workouts with live editing so every session adapts in seconds.
  • 07

    GroopTroop — AI group coordination

    App Store submission · TestFlight live

    AI scheduling co-pilot that resolves conflicts, proposes plans, and keeps every circle aligned from one command center.
  • 08

    IzzoCam — AI commentary companion

    TestFlight beta · Daily releases

    Transforms a beloved dog’s live stream into playful AI narration with SwiftUI polish and daily release cadence.
  • 09

    Ring — Job alert automation

    Private beta · Nightly + on-demand runs

    Modular scouting agent that hunts PM openings across CSE + ATS feeds and delivers ready-to-apply leads before they trend.
